meanings.definition: Thaumaturgists: practitioners of magic or miracles
meanings.sent1: The thaumaturgists amazed the crowd with their magical abilities.
meanings.sent2: The town was abuzz with excitement as the thaumaturgists prepared for their show.
meanings.sent3: The thaumaturgists joked that even they couldn't make the rain disappear for their outdoor performance.
meanings.sent4: Watching the thaumaturgists in action was like witnessing real-life sorcery.
meanings.sent5: Children's faces lit up with wonder as the thaumaturgists pulled off their mesmerizing tricks.

meanings.definition: Thaumaturgists: those who perform wonders or marvels
meanings.sent1: The thaumaturgists showcased their incredible talents at the annual fair.
meanings.sent2: People traveled from far and wide to witness the thaumaturgists' extraordinary feats.
meanings.sent3: The thaumaturgists' performances left the audience in awe of their skills.
meanings.sent4: The thaumaturgists' abilities seemed almost supernatural to the onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The community regarded the thaumaturgists as modern-day magicians.
